availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of M. Sowder and Philly Sowder. Married Ellen Thompson Sowder in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, on March 7th, 1856. Father of Joseph Sowder. Farmer in Rockcastle County in 1850. Farmer in Rockcastle County in 1860. Farmer in Rockcastle County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Southern District, p. 181B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, p. 495.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, District 6, p. 92A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Rockcastle County, KY, June 1863, p. 339.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994053, Rockcastle County Marriages, p. 6.
